summary: This document is an email chain forwarding a response from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) Warden to Judge Richard M. Berman regarding an inquiry about Jeffrey Epstein, who was in custody under case number 19 cr 490. The email includes an attachment of the Warden's response.

keyFacts: The document is dated August 12, 2019, shortly before Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
It shows official judicial oversight, with Judge Richard M. Berman making an inquiry about Epstein's status or conditions at the MCC.
Warden Lamine N'Diaye of the Metropolitan Correctional Center responded to the judge's inquiry, indicating communication between the court and prison officials.
The correspondence is related to case number 19 cr 490, the federal case against Jeffrey Epstein.
The email chain involves forwarding the Warden's response, highlighting bureaucratic communication within the justice system regarding a high-profile inmate.
